usage.cn: 人人最后都会死，但非人人都曾活过。
usage.eng: Everybody dies, but not everybody lives.

usage.cn: 一辈子拥有五个真心朋友，此生你就了无遗憾。
usage.eng: When you die, if you've got five real friends, then you've had a great life.

usage.cn: 时光荏苒，但我们的爱永远相随，记得保持联络，记得我。
usage.eng: Time will always fly, but our love will never die. Keep in touch and remember me.

usage.cn: 亦余心之所善兮，虽九死其犹未悔。
usage.eng: For the ideal that I hold near to my heart, I would not regret a thousand times to die.
